subject: Re: [junit] Generate a JUnit output similar to ANT
msgSnippet: hi, You can use the Junit task in your ANT scripts. You should be able to find more information in the ANT and Junit documentation use ... I got
messageBody:
hi,

You can use the Junit task in your ANT scripts. You should be able to find more information in the ANT and Junit documentation

use <junit>...</junit>

I got hold this by googling "junit task"

regards
vasu


----- Original Message ----
From: Sivarama Krishnan <siva_2000_1@...>
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, January 9, 2007 2:39:19 PM
Subject: [junit] Generate a JUnit output similar to ANT

I need to just generate an HTML report for JUNIT
testcases/output not using ANT. Is there any
alternative tool to generate HTML reports for the pass
and failed cases. Thanks in advance.

--SRK
